action.params: txt:You cut down the tree and build a door.
txt:That's too much money for me.;counter:100
txt:I don't want to be spiritually enlighted.;counter:100
txt:I don't want to be spiritually enlighted.;counter:100
txt:I have no interest in plumbery.;counter:100
txt:Thanks. I'm so proud of being a plumber now.;counter:100
txt:You use math to compute the good combination of numbers.
txt:You use math to compute the good combination of numbers.
txt:You won. Here is a lot of money.;counter:100
txt:This is not enough money to buy my castle.;counter:100
txt:I've red this book already, thanks.
txt:A pipe does not know how to read.
txt:You don't look wise enough to become a monk.;counter:100
txt:Bring me any item and I'll help you.;counter:100
txt:How come there is no cable car in this game ?.;counter:100
txt:There is no use for this.;counter:100
txt:Yes, you can buy the castle by giving a lot of money to its owner.;counter:100
txt:Find the other end of this pipe and use it to travel faster.;counter:100
txt:Find a hatchet to cut down this tree.;counter:100
txt:Use this to buy a lottery ticket.;counter:100
txt:Use this door on any building to enter it.;counter:100
txt:Put a door on this to enter it.;counter:100
txt:This can be used to go in the sewers.;counter:100
txt:Use it to cut down a tree.;counter:100
txt:Try to find the good numbers and win a lot of money.;counter:100
txt:Use the money to buy the castle.;counter:100
txt:Give this book to who needs it more.;counter:100
txt:This is an individual, leave him alone.;counter:100
txt:Only a monk can remove this flute from the rock.
txt:You remove the flute from the rock.
txt:Seriously, there is no point in putting anybody in a cage.;counter:100
txt:There is already someone in the cage.
txt:This fountain can't possibly handle that much money.
txt:You drop money in the fountain.
txt:Profession #var$achievements$ / #var$total achievements$ tried to do something with the umbrella.
